CustomField.description: The number of orgs linked via OAuth across all members of the team. This doesn't mean the number of _distinct_ orgs that are linked to, as each member of the team may bring their connection to the same org. This excludes scratch orgs and user/pass orgs.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of orgs linked via OAuth across all members of the team. This doesn't mean the number of _distinct_ orgs that are linked to, as each member of the team may bring their connection to the same org. This excludes scratch orgs and user/pass orgs.
CustomField.label: Active org connections
